nodes.text: Solar Phoenix 2 was an area of the Karthakk system which was a hotspot for dogfights and deadly activity. During the time of the Galactic Civil War, it served as the Galactic Empire's point of operations against Nym and his band of loyal thugs. It was imperative to use caution when careening through this area. The Empire maintained a space station in the region.

Solar Phoenix 2 was a location in Jump to Lightspeed, the 2004 expansion pack for the massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
